recipe.ingredients: - chicken breasts: 4 (about 6 ounces each) - turmeric: 1 teaspoon - garlic powder: 1 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/2 teaspoon - salt: 1/2 teaspoon - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - zucchini (sliced): 2 medium - bell peppers (sliced, assorted colors): 2 - red onion (sliced): 1 medium - lemon (juiced): 1
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Marinade: In a small bowl, combine turmeric, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, olive oil, and lemon juice. 2. Marinate Chicken: Place chicken breasts in a large bowl or resealable bag and coat with half of the marinade. Let it sit for at least 30 minutes to absorb the flavors. 3. Prep Vegetables: Toss the zucchini, bell peppers, and red onion with the remaining marinade. 4. Grill Chicken and Vegetables: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes on each side or until fully cooked. Simultaneously, grill the vegetables for about 5 minutes on each side or until they are tender and have charred edges. 5. Serve: Slice the grilled chicken and serve alongside the grilled vegetables.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 15g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Sodium: 350mg, Saturated Fat: 1.5g, Total Fat: 10g, Protein: 35g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 4g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1168 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chicken breasts: 822 calories for 24 ounces (4 x 6 ounces) Olive oil: 239 calories per 2 tablespoons Zucchini: 33 calories per two medium Bell Peppers: 37 calories for two Red Onion: 28 calories for one medium Lemon Juice: 9 calories per lemon - Serving People: 4
